item.title: About
item.description: My name is Victor, Li Chuang. Iâ€™m currently a Year 2 PhD student of NUS Intergrative Science and Engineering Program (ISEP) under NUS Graduate School (NUSGS) starting from August 2020. I am jointly advised by Prof Kan Min-Yen from Web IR/NLP Group (WING) in School of Computing (SOC)and Prof Li Haizhou at Human Language Technology (HLT) Lab. My research interests are in Recommendation System, Conversational Recommendation System and Dialogue System.
